      • randomStrategy

        private java.lang.String randomStrategy(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> validMoves)
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • minimaxStrategy

        private java.lang.String minimaxStrategy(GameConsoleInterface game,
                                         int level,
                                         int alpha,
                                         int beta)
        A recursive function that checks for the best possible solutions based on a given depth to search through most of the logic was found from this website:https://www3.ntu.edu.sg/home/ehchua/programming/java/JavaGame_TicTacToe_AI.html
        Parameters:
        game - the game the AI is playing
        level - the depth of which the AI is looking through a higher depth means a better result
        alpha - the best maximum score used for prunning
        beta - the best minimum score used for prunning
